patthana23.31:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
patthana23.31:0.3_0: working for the basis of the skillful.
patthana23.31:1.1_0: No matter what is a basis for the skillful or unskillful.
patthana23.31:2.1_0: A Teaching is not the support for the ear ... the basis for the skillful.
patthana23.31:3.1_0: Not based on the ear, they have no basis, conditioned, dependently originated, since without a cause,
patthana23.31:3.1_2: On the basis of your twenty-five years old, one for twenty, or twenty-five years old. Taking a one robe, thereâ€™s no one-one in the forest.
